trackerCapture.query: SELECT p.person_id as id,pn.given_name as first_name,pn.family_name as last_name,pa.optOut as optOut FROM openmrs.person_name pn, openmrs.person p,openmrs.person_address pa where pn.person_id = p.person_id and pa.person_id = p.person_id and pa.preferred = 1 and pn.preferred = 1

program.name: patient information
program.query: SELECT p.person_id as id, Date(p.date_created) as date from openmrs.person p

program.name: Vaccination: Measles Administered
program.query: SELECT p.person_id as id , Date(v.administration_date) as date from openmrs.person p,openmrs.vac_vaccinations v where p.person_id = v.patient_id and v.vaccine_id = 14 and v.administered = 1 and v.location_id = :locationId
